title: Empowered Genetics
body:
Dr. Bruce Lipton, Ph.D. shares his revolutionary view of our conscious ability to affect gene expression. Throughout the eons of human history, our understanding of our place in the world has changed from a connection with the natural world, to completely separate from it. In modern times, this has led to certain notions, that have become recognized as scientific truths, which make us a victim of our environment. With new discoveries in epigenetics, our control over the wellbeing of our bodies is placed back into our own hands, if we are ready to accept it. 

From this revelation we come to better understand:
•	The four myth-perceptions that shape our current world view and how we can overcome them
•	A brief introduction to epigenetics which shows our ability to consciously affect gene expression
•	The role of chaos in our continued evolution as a species
•	How we can create a new sustainable civilization from this chaos
teaser: Dr. Bruce Lipton, Ph.D. shares his revolutionary view of our conscious ability to affect gene expression. With new discoveries in epigenetics, our control over the wellbeing of our bodies is placed back into our own hands, if we are ready to accept it.

title: Debunking Evolutionary Myths
body:
Our perceptions of the universe are starting to shift as we face a renaissance in science. New discoveries in DNA and evolution are challenging previously accepted notions of truth. Dr. Bruce Lipton Ph.D. guides us through a progression of evolutionary theories to help us better understand how we achieved a disempowered place in our world. As he dispels these myths of genes, we gain a better understanding of the connection we have with our environment, and the role of consciousness as the primary control mechanism for our biology.

With this level of understanding, we: 
•	Gain a better understanding the flow of information within the body, as it takes signals from the environment
•	We look past theories of evolution to better understand the actual evolutionary process 
•	Learn the connection between evolution and the environment 
•	The role of DNA as genetic blueprint, rather than a switch that can be turned on or off
teaser: Our perceptions of the universe are starting to shift as we face a renaissance in science. New discoveries in DNA and evolution are challenging previously accepted notions of the connection we have with our environment, and the role of consciousness.

title: Quantum Perceptions of Matter
body:
We do not have to be victims of our genes or our environment. When we understand the role our perception plays in genetic expression, we come to realize that we have always been masters of controlling gene characteristics. Dr. Bruce Lipton Ph.D. walks us through the connection between DNA and the proteins which materialize as features in the body. As we take this into the quantum level, our perceptions of matter and energy change the way we interact with DNA. 

With this insight to the secret of life, you will: 
•	Learn the different signals, from drugs and energy, that shape the body
•	See that matter is influenced by the energetic signals around and within us 
•	Understand the vital role consciousness plays for controlling protein behavior 
•	Gain a different view of life and consciousness from quantum physics
teaser: We do not have to be victims of our genes or our environment. When we understand the role our perception plays in genetic expression, we come to realize that we have always been masters of controlling gene characteristics.

title: It's a Matter of Energy
body:
Energy is the source of everything, including our bodies. The material existence we experience as solid matter is nothing more than energy. And when we understand the influence of energy on matter, we begin to understand how it influences our bodies. Bruce Lipton Ph.D. takes us deeper into understanding the energetic signals, from our environment, that shape genetic expression in our bodies. 

We gain deeper insights into:
•	Different types of energy and their effect on material existence 
•	The two things that control biology – Drugs and Energy Fields
•	Good and bad vibes are very real things that can affect our wellbeing 
•	The connection between consciousness and the energy of everything
teaser: When we understand the influence of energy on matter, we begin to understand how it influences our bodies. Bruce Lipton Ph.D. takes us deeper into understanding the energetic signals, from our environment, that shape genetic expression in our bodies.

title: Consciousness and the Body
body:
"We have been taught that the brain of the cell is the nucleus. Now, we know that is not true.  Dr. Bruce Lipton Ph.D. reveals that the true seat of consciousness for the body is the cell membrane, as it conveys information from the environment into the cells. In order for a signal from the environment to affect the proteins in our body, it must first go through the information transfer process of the cell membrane. This can act like a switch, which is controlled by perceptions and beliefs, as the state of our mind affects the information transfer process and the resulting character of the cells. 

This gives us clarity into:
•	How the cell membrane acts like a liquid crystal semiconductor, transmitting signals into the cell
•	The similarity between computers and cell membranes 
•	Insight into the structure and function of the cells nervous system 
•	The mind as the sole governing agency of the body"
teaser: We have been taught that the brain of the cell is the nucleus. Not true.  Dr. Bruce Lipton Ph.D. reveals that the true seat of consciousness for the body is the cell membrane, as it conveys information from the environment into the cells.

title: Controlling Genetic Expression
body:
In this science-packed episode, Dr. Bruce Lipton Ph.D. explains how we can move beyond genetic determinism to take epigenetic control over our lives. This means that you are not your genes. You can change your genetic expression by changing how you respond to your environment. He reveals how perception is the most important part of altering our genetic readout. When we change our views of our environment, we change everything about our lives, from the inside out.

Important lessons we learn in this episode:
• Just because a trait runs in your family does not necessarily mean that it will affect you 
• Lifestyle changes affect cancer and your overall wellbeing
• We go deep into the mechanisms within the cells where signals from the environment affect the DNA blueprint activity.
• The flow of signals from the environment through DNA, RNA, and proteins
• How consciousness affects that flow of information
teaser: In this science-packed episode, Dr. Bruce Lipton Ph.D. explains how we can move beyond genetic determinism to take epigenetic control over our lives. This means that you can change your genetic expression by changing how you respond to your environment

title: Subconscious Programming
body:
Are you creating the life you want or are your living the life you were programmed with? Bruce Lipton explains the functions of our conscious and subconscious minds, focusing on the emotional states of hope and fear, and the biochemical states they create in the body. It is these hormones which affect the subconscious programming that shapes what we believe and create in our world. 

To better understand this, he explains: 
• The role of certain hormones and neurochemicals and how they affect the cells 
• The subconscious programming we have downloaded from other people 
• Why you are not living the life you want, because of this biochemical programming 
• Reprogramming the subconscious mind creates a heaven on earth experience
teaser: Are you creating the life you want or are your living the life you were programmed with? Bruce Lipton explains the functions of our conscious and subconscious minds, focusing on the emotional states of hope and fear.

title: The Honeymoon Effect
body:
Building upon our understanding of the control differences between the subconscious and conscious minds, Bruce Lipton gives us the tools needed to live the Honeymoon Effect, every day. This is something we experience whenever we fall in love and everything in the world gets better. Learning to reprogram your inner mind with wishes and desires enables you to get the life that you desire.

You can apply this to every area of your life by understanding:
•	That your thoughts create a broadcast of energy into the world around you which resonates with people and situations
•	How your Inner beliefs control the expression of this energy and the character of your life
•	Much of what is in your subconscious was programmed even before you were conscious
•	The Four fundamental ways of changing subconscious programming
teaser: Building upon our understanding of the control differences between the subconscious and conscious minds, Bruce Lipton gives us the tools needed to live the Honeymoon Effect, every day. This is something we experience whenever we fall in love.

title: Science of Manifesting Health
body:
What if symptoms of an illness are not the problem, but simply manifestation from the depths of consciousness as an indication that something is wrong in the body and environment. Bruce Lipton takes us deeper into the ways that thought shapes the character of our body, focusing on how our perception of the environment produces the signals that your body reacts to. Ultimately, our health is a manifestation of the inner states of consciousness.

This means that:
• When you perceive stress in the environment, your immune response is inhibited
• Adverse states of consciousness, toxins, and trauma can manifest as health problems
• The science of manifestation showing how consciousness is the mechanism that controls the body
• Knowledge is power, which can be harnessed to create states of wellbeing
teaser: Health is a manifestation of consciousness. Bruce Lipton takes us deeper into the ways that thought shapes the character of our body, focusing on how our perception of the environment produces the signals that your body reacts to.

title: Immunity & the Microbiome
body:
Human beings are now considered superorganisms, when we take into account the importance of the microorganisms living throughout our bodies. Bruce Lipton reveals the three primary functions of the human microbiome and why it is so essential for our health and emotional wellbeing. Along the way, we discover the uses of tonsils and the appendix, which were previously considered vestigial organs. 

Now, we know:
• The integral functions of the microbiome for continued health and wellbeing of the body
• What lymph is and the role of lymph nodes to clear toxins from the body
• The role of the tonsils and programming the immune system
• How the appendix helps you rebuild your microbiome after it is flushed out
teaser: Bruce Lipton reveals the three primary functions of the human microbiome and why it is so essential for our health and emotional wellbeing.

title: Telomeres, Longevity & Spirituality
body:
How we perceive our life, good or bad, can affect longevity. Bruce Lipton relays the degree of control that we have over the production of telomerase in our body and the preservation of telomeres. Initially, this gives us insights into longevity. But as we explore deeper, we see the spiritual connection between our bodies and eternal life as energetic beings. 

Through this exploration: 
• Understand the mechanics of growth and cell reproduction
• Learn how the right lifestyle and consciousness can increase longevity
• See that our cells act as receptors to our spiritual nature, like tiny radios receiving signals of consciousness
• Come to recognize that we are energetic beings of the field, 
• Discover how we are projected into a body with the right biological conditions to receive the signal
teaser: How we perceive our life, good or bad, can affect longevity. Bruce Lipton relays the degree of control that we have over the production of telomerase in our body and the preservation of telomeres.

title: Harmonious Fractals
body:
Everything in our universe is built from repeating fractal patterns. This same geometry is present in our bodies and our relationships. Bruce Lipton explains how these recursive equations form everything in existence from the tiniest atom to the social dynamics that govern our societies. It all comes down to understanding the Hermetic Maxim of: As above, so below.

These revelations give us clarity into:
• A new model of evolution based on complexity of nervous systems built on fractals
• The correlation between chemical reactions and codependent relationships
• Balancing our lives by understanding the basics of chemical bonds
• How we can live in harmony with each other and the natural world
teaser: Everything in our universe is built from repeating fractal patterns. Bruce Lipton explains how these recursive equations form everything in existence from the tiniest atom to the social dynamics that govern our societies.

title: Conscious Evolution
body:
From the tiniest bacterium to complex societies, the evolution of human consciousness is built into the very foundations of life on our planet. Bruce Lipton guides us through evolutionary stages of life, explaining how this leads to the increase of consciousness across the planet. As scientists struggle to measure intelligence, insights into the structure of the cell membrane may finally solve this puzzle. 

Awareness of these concepts increases our perception into:
• The connection of all life on our planet, contributing to advances in intellect
• How we can measure consciousness through protein complexes and communities
• The increase in human intelligence through a collective consciousness
• The next stage of human evolution that might see us collaborating with civilizations from other worlds
teaser: Bruce Lipton guides us through evolutionary stages of life, explaining how this leads to the increase of consciousness across the planet.
